articles.title: McLaren boss reveals biggest Daniel Ricciardo regret as Lando Norris offers brutal take on sacking - Daily Mail
articles.description: The CEO of McLaren says his biggest regret about signing Ricciardo is not having a better contract in place. Meanwhile, the Aussie's teammate says he has no sympathy for Ricciardo.
articles.content:
McLaren CEO Zak Brown admits his biggest regret about signing Daniel Ricciardo was not making his contract watertight so the team wouldn't have to write him such a big cheque if it didn't work out.
… [+3104 chars]
